 2024-10482024-09-20ESDC
ActPoverty Reduction Act
PrecisAppointment of LINDSAY LEE ELLEN KRETSCHMER ATTWOOD of Toronto, Ontario, to be a part-time member of the National Advisory Council on Poverty, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective October 1, 2024.
